website_summaries.verdict: Handsomely designed set cooks just as great as it looks while on display.
pros: The products look like the images
Great for oven or stovetop use
Non-stick, with no butter or oil needed
The set functions well for daily use
cons: Some pieces warped after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: I Love this 10-Piece set
customer_reviews.text: I Love this 10-Piece set! Had bought one Copper piece in a store just to try it out and bought this 10-piece set because I love these pots and pans!! Came packed well and arrived on time. You won't be sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Baker

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: After less than two months of use, the non-stick surface started to chip and pelling. Called Copper customer service and was told that in order to get a replacement, we have to send the defective products back to Copper on our expense and plus a money order to cover the replacement. Not sure what kind warranty service is this.
customer_reviews.author: Savelover

customer_reviews.title: They are not "Non-stick"
customer_reviews.text: These pots and pans are pretty good in comparison with a "normal" set. They are not "Non-stick" nor does the "Food slide right off!". When I boiled water (I tried regular water from the faucet and filtered water) it leaves a film all around the inside of the whole pot. Yes, the noodles did mostly slide out, but about a quarter of them stayed inside and I needed a spoon to empty the rest. As far as noodles go, a regular pot will do even a little more than this one. In a regular pot, only about 3 or 4 noodles stay in. I was really hoping for the "non-stick" portion.
customer_reviews.author: Shannyn

customer_reviews.title: 9" Fry Pan does NOT work.
customer_reviews.text: I am now on my second set of these pans. I bought first set and they all worked except small fry pan. I returned the set and bought a new set. Pulled out the pans and tested them. Again all but the small fry pan function. I do not have the ability to leave a message to seller so maybe they read here. I do not know if I should return and shop for a new set from another seller or just keep cause I do like the set. But it is a real downer not having an egg pan.
customer_reviews.author: brian mitchell

customer_reviews.title: The 8-inch fry pan did not work on any induction ...
customer_reviews.text: The 8-inch fry pan did not work on any induction surface. The rest of the set did. I'm not sure whether this is a general issue or just one faulty pan. The only option was to return the whole set. I didn't bother trying a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Find a better handle
customer_reviews.text: First time trying out a copper set, and I do like the relative ease of cleaning and benefits of cooking on copper... but the handle design is pretty terrible. I have to use an oven mitt to hold it and it isn’t sealed and holds water from when you wash it. Then when you cook with it next, steam starts shooting out where the metal is molded together, generally in your direction. Find a better handle...
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic set!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and quality product. The wife loves this set. Nothing seems to stick to it! But make sure you keep this stuff out of a dishwasher, hand wash only if you want it to last.
customer_reviews.author: dptydog

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very satisfied with the product, over our expectation. The delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one MINOR issue
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. It works on Induction Ovens like its supposed to. The ONLY issue I had was if it is placed in the Dishwasher somehow water gets in the handle. You have to turn the handle down to let it dry, let the water seep out of it. There doesn't appear to be a hole, water just winds up in there. Kind of irritating when you want to put the pots away. You have to let the water drain first. I've also found that it doesn't cook as well as a thicker pan that I also purchased. So maybe the thicker material cooks better on Induction Ovens. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Andoff

customer_reviews.title: Nope, don’t do it.
customer_reviews.text: This are a very low quality product, I only bought them because they worked with and induction style cooktop. Not long into the use of the skillets I found that food started sticking and now I have to black sticky spots on both skillets. I even would cook using a little olive oil to help flavor and avoid problems. Initially I had a problem with one of the pots not working with the induction top and had to return the entire set and then wait for an additional order to be sent. Not very convenient. Not highly recommendable either.
customer_reviews.author: Baldybayer

customer_reviews.title: I loved these until I they started burning me.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these pots/pans. They are very nice and easy to cook with. They are not great quality. They are not as described, the handles heat up and burn you. The handles also will hold water in them and the water heats up and will burn you as well. I have been burnt a few times by these pans. I have tried returning them or swapping them out, but they won't return them. I don't recommend these after learning more about them.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty/Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice economy set, not luxury
customer_reviews.text: This set is adequate, but I wouldn’t call it luxury. It is very easy to clean, but scratch resistant it isn’t. We’re only using plastic or silicone utensils but I can already see slight scratches on the bottom of most of the pans. I haven’t had a problem with heat distribution, but I use an electric stove it isn’t great at heat distribution anyway. The stock pot is fairly small. Cooking soup in it for 4 people isn’t terribly easy, but it can be done. I wish there was a smaller sauce pan/pot for single-serve items like noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Package was previously opened - pans damaged
customer_reviews.text: This will not be a good review. The box arrived less than an hour ago. We were excited to see our new copper pans. Then, it goes downhill from there. We first noticed that the package looked as if it was a re-pack. It was obvious that the box had been opened previously, even though the pans and skillets were still in the original plastic bags. Upon removing the plastic bags, it was obvious that two of the items, one pan and one skillet, were seriously dented on the side. The lids (see attached photos) won't even fit tight on the pans. We will be looking to return these right away. So terribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a simple yet sturdy set for my new home. While it doesn't have the larger pans, I do love the sizes I have. They are perfect for my family of 4 easy to clean. My only complaint/ recommendation is if you cook greasy foods (like bacon) you have to wash by hand (or do a great rinse) because it will look spotty after a dishwasher cycle
customer_reviews.author: eawallace1015

customer_reviews.title: handles get very hot on stovetop
customer_reviews.text: The handles get hot when used on the stovetop. My other pot and pan set is stainless steel and the handles do not get hot. Returned them and got farbarware stainless steel pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Janice and Tim

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Please note that these are NOT COPPER but rather copper color coated cheap non stick pans.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: a good quality and affordable set of cookware designed for induction cook tops
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call these pots luxury cook ware. rather they are affordable, light and practical. I like that they are also not stick and have holed handles that don't heat up. rather than call these pots luxury cook ware, I would call them affordable, practical and easy to use. I liked the non stick feature and the holed and insulated handles.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE EM BUT SAD
customer_reviews.text: received pots, pans & lids box they were in were in good condition, no bumps or bruises on boxes pulled all items out and 3 of them were warped, bent I can deal and just want to keep them I'm sure cooking in them with the warp will not affect me using them aside from that all is well
customer_reviews.author: Dolores S.

customer_reviews.title: Pan was scratched
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these pans for my birthday and I JUST got to open them because we were moving and they went into storage. After opening the box, I noticed these two small silver screw things in with the skillet (under the cardboard). As you can see in the picture these pieces scratched the skillet. I am not happy!! If these were important pieces to the package, they should have been in a protective bag. BUT the pieces do not go to anything!
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Lann

customer_reviews.title: Mid level quality and not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality of these leaves a lot to be desired. I only have two of the set left less than a year later. And the large pot has a huge chunk out of the bottom. I’m not super easy on my pots so I didn’t give them a lower star score. But I wish they had lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: Not coated properly
customer_reviews.text: Obvious areas where the copper coating was not applied correctly or uneven. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Stariha

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- FRY PANS DO NOT WORK WITH INDUCTION!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to work with my new Wolf Induction Cooktop. The large and small pot works great. But when I went to make eggs in the small fry pan, the pans did not work on the cooktop. I checked the large fry pan, and that didn't work either. VERY disappointed. It clearly states on the box that these pans are made for induction cooktops. This is mis-advertising and I have thrown away the box, so I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY SCRATCHABLE
customer_reviews.text: Scratches very easily. Metal fry insert WILL scratch pan. Not sure why this would be offered. Plastic spatulas will also scratch pan surface Not a practical set of pans. NOT non stick. Use of oil or butter for non stick cooking evaporates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Severely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was sincerely dissapointed when I received my package.. Everything was amazing besides the severely damaged stainless steel steamer insert, with the amount of money ive spent i expected a high quality item is there any way you guys can make this right.. As I am a advocate Amazon shopper
customer_reviews.author: Britney 757

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further. I can not be happier. Have used for 5 months now on our induction stovetop. Can use on other tops as well however induction needs magnetic pots and pans. They are nonstick, easy to clean, have no been scratched or damaged whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cooks food faster than normal pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Cooks food fast, easy to clean. I only gave them 4 stars cause one of the pans had a small dent in the side and one of the glass tops had a scratch in the glass. Did not feel it was worth returning because it would not effect the performance of them.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Harwood

customer_reviews.title: WENT TO THE HOSPITAL
customer_reviews.text: Why in the world in 2019 they do a pan that does not protect the handle of the pan from the heat? All the major brands they are thermic resistant in the handle this brand no! The worse $80 spent in my entire life. If I could I want to send them back. I ended up in the hospital with a bad burn on my hand. So upsetting
customer_reviews.author: Miky

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the copper coating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set for the dollar value but only really needed or use 1 of the pans. The small pan is too small for more then an egg or two. I should have just ordered to frying pans. They do scratch and wear unfortunately take extra care to not damage the copper surface, as this ruins the non stick, and easy to clean features.
customer_reviews.author: James Bross

customer_reviews.title: New is sometimes better.
customer_reviews.text: I love them. Trading my professional Calphalon for these copper beauties. So easy to clean, heats up quickly. I love that nothing sticks to them. Made chicken and dumplings in them and they turned out beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ulrigg

customer_reviews.title: Best cook set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect east to clean and bake with eggs slide right out of the pan. Do not scrub clean with anything rough I learned the hard way. I still use a little bit of PAM when I cook anything.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's not COPPER CHEFS BRAND...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for cooking mostly;"SPANISH STYLE FOOD"PUETORICAN/& Dominican Style of dishes.Love the fact it doesn't stick,But in all honesty I was really trying to buy COPPER CHEFF POTS&PAN'S.BUT I ORDERED THIS BRAND THINKING IT WAS"COPPER CHEFS BRAND",But turn out to be pretty 👌.I have COPPER CHEF POT ALREADY 2YEARS&HALF,& ITS EXCELLENT BRAND OF COOKING POTS.BUT A LITTLE MORE EXPENSIVE THEN THIS BRAND.BUT THIS CAME TO BE MY EXPECTATIONS.
customer_reviews.author: BLACK LIST

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: looks great but the handle gets hot when cooking. Should have gotten another set with coated handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ben CC

customer_reviews.title: Food doesn't stick not even without oil  before to put the meet in it. So easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The Best of The best..!!I I recommend them. I had never get pans for that price with that quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthsita

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice. I gave them as a gift and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. They are very nice. I gave them as a gift and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: More than met my expectations. Love it would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Greenway

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Thia was a wedding gift. They both loved it and commented about how well it was made.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The thickness of the medal is a little lite but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Copper pan set
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I got the copper top hot plate also and that is all I am using. Saving money as I am not using my electric range.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my set of copper pots. They are very easy to clean and use. I just have to remember to use potholders for the lids and the pots. They are lite weight and not as heavy as my old pots. One small area of the lining of the Dutch oven wore off the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Keene

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The product works excellent and I would buy the cookware again. 2 thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: tractorBunny

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I started out with just one piece that I got from Job Lot and loved it so I decided to replace my pot set with this.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNE C WARREN

customer_reviews.title: One of the pans arrived scratched but they are great to cook with - heating evenly is the best ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the pans arrived scratched but they are great to cook with - heating evenly is the best part.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Just got it in January and it’s already sticking. BADLY!! Don’t fall for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Easy to clean and use. The lid handle do get hot, so make sure you use a pot holder.
customer_reviews.author: Loops

customer_reviews.title: You know you need them... Go ahead, they are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them! Clean up is a breeze & they work good with our induction eye
customer_reviews.author: Timothy  & Becky Coley

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Hooked on induction cooking to better control the temperature. This set meets most of the needs for preparing food.
customer_reviews.author: Nytro

customer_reviews.title: Season the pans!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not much of a cook but I read up a bit about seasoning the pans ... and yeah I love these pans ... I use them all the time cooking eggs, sausage, bacon, chicken and beef ... properly seasoned ... my pans don't stick at all and I use silicone utensils ... life is easy and good!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Copper Luxury Pots
customer_reviews.text: I love these copper pots! So easy to clean, food never sticks to pots and the pots come with lids. I hang them up in my kitchen so there is more space in my cabinet! I plan on buying a set for my Florida home and for my daughter for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Modery

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Use them all the time just hope copper doesn't cause cancer.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: A great gift item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother, who loves it! A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Can handle ethnic cuisines just fine
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Love function. Love the ease of cleaning. It's going to be with me for a number of years. I cook traditional foods from "abroad" and these pots can take it. Boom. Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Family D

customer_reviews.title: Great item but needs improvements on handles
customer_reviews.text: The non stick is great and the cleaning process is great and easy but the handle have a tendency to heat up to quickly must be very careful
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Once you go copper, you never go back!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they are lightweight!!! Super easy to clean and very durable. I cook a lot, and use them daily. I appreciate the copper, heats up very fast! Definitely a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy- love the lighter weight but not flimsy and cooking was a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: MORGAN BROCK-MCKEAN

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these pan exceeded my expection. easy to clean. i would suggest racks for the pan & covers, they do not have to be expensive.
customer_reviews.author: juanita lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans! Have a set for home and RV.
customer_reviews.author: R MERRILL

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! My grandmother recommended them and I couldn't be happier. Super easy to clean and nothing sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cookware for my son and his new wife as a gift as they have an induction cook top. They said that the food stuck in the pans when they were used and so they are not really happy with it. Looks nice but it has some problems.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Clarke

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: complete garbage...... living in regret on this purchase. They wont last 6 months .
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Just All-around Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Really great pans! Clean easy! And great quality for price!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value,  easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, easy clean, easy to store. Used daily for past 5 months and no wear yet
customer_reviews.author: Becky Keller

customer_reviews.title: My wife love Copper pans
customer_reviews.text: My wife love Copper pans. Easy to clean and cook on. I think we have every one out there now.
customer_reviews.author: Wingding

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one pretty good for the money is excellent by. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jose lopez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price way above quality I thought I would get. 🙏
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was stunned. Brown perfectly sits n stores amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kerker

customer_reviews.title: I love this Copper pan set
customer_reviews.text: I love this Copper pan set. Will look for additional pieces to go with this set. And it is easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Tinkie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pans
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these pots and pans. Perfect weight and so so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia A. Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick!  Easy to cook & easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved them. Have then since may or June & so far so good. They’ll last you depending on how good you take care of them. These aren’t to be washed with anything to hard all you need is a sponge really.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy lomeli

customer_reviews.title: GOOD COOKING POTS WHICH WERE LIGHTER
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED. GOOD COOKING POTS WHICH WERE LIGHTER.
customer_reviews.author: backs

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 pot and 1 pan work on my induction stove top. The others that were put in the box were fakes. Basically I paid for 2 items that actually work. Sooooo disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Camelia McClain

customer_reviews.title: I heard about how great AMAZON PRODUCTS were constantly from my cousin
customer_reviews.text: I heard about how great AMAZON PRODUCTS were constantly from my cousin. Well my pots n pans were my 1st order n i absolutely love my pots n pans set ! Works great ! Everything i have purchased since has been from AMAZON n will b the only way i ever shop. THANK YOU AMAZON !
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money! Nice quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grown daughter. She loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi69

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for Christmas, absolutely love it! Very easy to clean and cooks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kohtz

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my new induction cooktop and it doesn’t properly work - especially the small frying pan
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cookware collection
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware. Works wonderfully on my new Induction top range.
customer_reviews.author: NitaYLDe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible food sticks they are tough to clean and not worth the money at all.

customer_reviews.title: Great condition
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in great condition and the product looked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Shattered
customer_reviews.text: My fiance was steaming some vegetables, one of the lids shattered and the food had to be thrown away. How can I purchase a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pans ever. Never going back to any other cooking pans.

customer_reviews.title: Copper pots
customer_reviews.text: These are great pots, albeit they are not Copper Chef pots.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Mcrae-Caughman

customer_reviews.title: They are just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The pans are lightweight, easy to clean, and nice looking. The skillet isn’t very big, that’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B

customer_reviews.title: 8” does not work on induction tops.
customer_reviews.text: I love the pan set with the exception of the 8” small pan. It will not work on our induction stove top. I just saw another review that said the same. Easy to clean and cooks great!
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: It's worth every penny .
customer_reviews.text: I love it . It's what I expected to be .
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: The handles hold water when cooking and certainly after washing. The water steams in the handles during cooking and I have been burned on use. The pans are fine except for the handles and need to be redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kunce

customer_reviews.title: Was a CHristmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Only down side is the handles get hot. Need to consider some kind of handle cover. But other wise they are GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: I promise you will falling in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best pots I have ever had very easy to clean I absolutely love this product I would defiantly recommend this product to all of my family and friends everyone should try this product

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I sent them to my daughter in college. She loved them,

customer_reviews.title: Great on my convection stove
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! So easy to cook with and clean. They are lightweight and easy to put away.

customer_reviews.title: Since my purchase of copper chef pots and pans I only use copper chef now
customer_reviews.text: My last set of parts did not come with the copper chef Trademark initial sign on it like the set I bought for my daughter

customer_reviews.title: Great value, Great cookware and most of all a very happy wife!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves the cookware. She loves the way it cooks and brings style to our kitchen. She also loves the easy cleanup.

customer_reviews.title: easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I like the even heating and the no stick surface for the ease of cleaning

customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking. No sticking at all. Very easy washing and cleanup.

customer_reviews.text: Love this non stick, light weight, no oils needed, easy cleaning and handle end does not get hot.

product_meta.title: Copper Pan 10-Piece Luxury Induction Cookware Set Non-Stick, 21.5 x 11.5 x 11 inches
product_meta.description: Color:Light colorGood for cooking with induction, gas, electric, or ceramic glass stove tops. Oven safe up to 550F. You can cook without oil or butter with this cookware. Do not use cooking spray on this pan as it can cause residue build up. Instead use a small amount of oil or buter to lightly coat the inside surface of the pan. Never leave cooking food unattended. Take extra care while cooking and handling hot pans when children or pets are present.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars520 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
